title: My game stuck :|   . Help!

embed.description: Provides free image upload and hosting integration for forums. Free picture hosting and photo sharing for websites and blogs.

body:
I need a support, im playing in NordicEast and after I finished a game with Rengar my game crash, after that I'm log in back to game and saw that screen.
If I reconnect that error and back me to luncherscreen.
I think that was fixed after few time, but I'm waiting like a hour and nothing changed.
I tried to to exit the game and log in again, same problem!
HELP ME !!{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: It looks like some players were experiencing a ghost game, so the match was failing to communicate that it ended with our servers.  It looks like the issue has been resolved, but in the future relogging can fix this or waiting about an hour.  All looks to be well now!

This is happening to me too :(

I've soon waited 3 hours  (currently almost 2,5 hours)

Hope they reply soon
